name: Explosive power into Z4
description:
Quite often, before settling into a Zone 4 effort, we must perform multiple surges. In today's session, the focus is on completing long sub-threshold efforts. 



However, each interval is preceded by multiple high power accelerations. The training effect is significantly changed by building up high lactate levels before a steady threshold effort. Lactate becomes the fuel source!
